jumbotron.title: Hello
jumbotron.content: Are you searching for high quality souvenir in affordable price? GIFU is the right place. So many bonus are waiting for you! We are able to ship all around Indonesia. Just sit on your comfortable couch and order it through your WhatsApp. No need to worry about anything, because what left is time to share it to your lovely guests!

whygifu.garansi: 3 days free RETURN for wrong items.
whygifu.allin: All in package, include emboss, packaging, thank you cards, and souvenir coupons. No additional steps!
whygifu.readytoship: Ready to ship all over Indonesia. Just sit back and your packages will be right in front of your door.
whygifu.orderyours: Order your souvenirs, printed invitation, digital invitation, hampers, and Bridesmaid Box from GIFU. You will definitely save your time!

jumbotron.title: Halo
jumbotron.content: Cari Souvenir Murah berkualitas? bikin di GIFU aja. Banyak bonusnya! Siap kirim ke seluruh Indonesia. Cukup pesan lewat WA, kami siap membuat souvenir impianmu, tanpa kamu harus keluar rumah. Anti ribet, tinggal bagiin ke tamu aja!

whygifu.garansi: Souvenirmu tidak sesuai pesanan? Jangan khawatir, kami siap RETUR!
whygifu.allin: Sudah ALL IN termasuk emboss / cetak nama, packaging, kartu ucapan terima kasih, dan kupon pengambilan souvenir. Gak usah ribet lagi deh!
whygifu.readytoship: Siap kirim ke seluruh Indonesia. Tak perlu ragu, kamu bisa pesan sample dulu lho!
whygifu.orderyours: Pesan Souvenir, Undangan Fisik, Undangan Digital, Hampers, dan Bridesmaid Box cukup di satu tempat saja
